title: A2UI Message Schema
description: Describes a JSON payload for an A2UI (Agent to UI) message, which is used to dynamically construct and update user interfaces. A message MUST contain exactly ONE of the action properties: 'beginRendering', 'surfaceUpdate', 'dataModelUpdate', or 'deleteSurface'.

beginRendering.description: Signals the client to begin rendering a surface with a root component and specific styles.

surfaceId.description: The unique identifier for the UI surface to be rendered.

root.description: The ID of the root component to render.

font.description: The primary font for the UI.

primaryColor.description: The primary UI color as a hexadecimal code (e.g., '#00BFFF').

surfaceUpdate.description: Updates a surface with a new set of components.

surfaceId.description: The unique identifier for the UI surface to be updated. If you are adding a new surface this *must* be a new, unique identified that has never been used for any existing surfaces shown.

components.description: A list containing all UI components for the surface.

items.description: Represents a *single* component in a UI widget tree. This component could be one of many supported types.

id.description: The unique identifier for this component.

weight.description: The relative weight of this component within a Row or Column. This corresponds to the CSS 'flex-grow' property. Note: this may ONLY be set when the component is a direct descendant of a Row or Column.

component.description: A wrapper object that MUST contain exactly one key, which is the name of the component type. The following component types are supported: AudioPlayer, BarChart, Button, Card, CheckBox, Column, DateTimeInput, Divider, Icon, Image, LineChart, List, Modal, MultipleChoice, PieChart, Row, ScatterChart, Slider, StackedChart, Tabs, Text, TextField, Video.

distribution.description: 水平分布方式：start, center, end, spaceBetween, spaceAround 或 spaceEvenly 默认值: 'start'

tabItems.description: 标签对象数组，每个对象包含 title（数据绑定）和 child（组件 ID）

dataModelUpdate.description: Updates the data model for a surface.

surfaceId.description: The unique identifier for the UI surface this data model update applies to.

path.description: An optional path to a location within the data model (e.g., '/user/name'). If omitted, or set to '/', the entire data model will be replaced.

contents.description: An array of data entries. Each entry must contain a 'key' and exactly one corresponding typed 'value*' property.

items.description: A single data entry. Exactly one 'value*' property should be provided alongside the key.

key.description: The key for this data entry.

valueMap.description: Represents a map as an adjacency list.

items.description: One entry in the map. Exactly one 'value*' property should be provided alongside the key.

deleteSurface.description: Signals the client to delete the surface identified by 'surfaceId'.

surfaceId.description: The unique identifier for the UI surface to be deleted.
